title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tools.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, PDF, RAG, dark mode, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama with prompts history, themes, and fuzzy search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copplet code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template using llama.cpp embeddings and Ollama for question answering.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor; supports selection prompts.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot frontend that talks to local Ollama backend.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama in Docker and docker-compose.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query Ollama models from within your vault for summarization.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; same generate/chat/embed API as Python/JS clients.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app with admin UI and REST endpoints for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a side-panel chat powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server (Bolt.js) that answers channel mentions using Ollama backends.
